home.message-copied-ok: The Palabrita has been copied to the clipboard

about.title: About Palabritas
about.paragraph-1: Palabritas app gives you a random Bible verse.
about.paragraph-2: One possible way to use the application is while praying (a holy hour, in front of the tabernacle, etc.) you can read a Palabrita to intuit what the Lord is suggesting to us at that moment.

credits.title: Credits
